citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on22-APR-19 at 11:28 pm.
Contact was made with a facility representative by phone. It was relayed that no one would be available to walk the
inspector through the inspection process for the day.
